name: CallReminders
0:
”Alexa, open call reminders”
”Alexa, launch call reminders”
”Alexa, launch call reminders and remind DAD to take out the trash tomorrow at 8am from Sam”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: call reminders
des:
Set it and forget it Call Reminders from Alexa that get delivered on time, every time!

Get scheduled (or delayed/timed) Call Reminders from Alexa (+1-206-316-8452). You'll always be reminded on-time & never miss a reminder again, especially when you're away from her!

In skill you can:

* Set reminders to triggered at a specific time & date, or duration.
* Add multiple phone numbers to your contacts and send them reminders too.
* Cancel the last reminder you set.

Skill has a free 7-day trial then requires a subscription to make Call Reminders.

Great alternative uses :)...

- Set it and forget it, birthday reminder calls to your friends and family
- Send an appropriately timed reminder to your loved one telling them just hwo much you love them
- more!

Also checkout the "Text Reminders" Skill.

Standard messaging and data rates may apply through your carrier.

PWe encourage you to leave a review if you like this Skill and comment with your suggestions. Your reviews encourage us to improve this skill and to keep making more great skills!

For a full list of skills, search for "CMM TECH" in the Alexa smartphone app or Amazon.com.
